mapper.select: select resource.id, resource.resource_address,resource.space,resource.storage_id, resource.create_time,resource.state,resource.type,resource.preview_pic, resource.device_sn, resource.uploader_id user_id, user.username user_username, user.jpush_id user_jpush_id, device.jpush_id device_jpush_id from resources resource left join devices device on resource.device_sn = device.sn left join users user on resource.uploader_id = user.id where resource.state = 1 order by resource.create_time desc

select resource.id, resource.resource_address,resource.space,resource.storage_id, resource.create_time,resource.state,resource.type,resource.preview_pic, resource.device_sn, resource.uploader_id user_id, user.username user_username, user.jpush_id user_jpush_id, device.jpush_id device_jpush_id from resources resource left join devices device on resource.device_sn = device.sn left join users user on resource.uploader_id = user.id where resource.state = 1 and resource.device_sn=#{deviceSN} order by resource.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into resources (id, resource_address, device_sn, space, storage_id, create_time, state, type ,preview_pic, uploader_id) values (uuid(),#{resourceAddress},#{device.sn},#{space},#{storageId},now(),1,#{type},#{previewPic},#{uploader.id})
